title: Print, "Espalier Garden Fashioned as a Labyrinth with Two Fountains", ca. 1700
inscribed: below image:  Jardin en Espallier de verduren de 4 pieces de façon de Labirente; bottom left:  D. Marot fec:; bottom right:  avec Privileg.; bottom right margin:  12
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Symmetrical garden designed as labyrinth with two fountains.  Garden enclosed in a wall with eight gates and lined by trees.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Espalier Garden Fashioned as a Labyrinth with Two Fountains", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. etching on paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-18.
